original_title: Holiday experiences with NTB American Express this Avurudu Season
original_body_lines: Nations Trust Bank American Express is extending its “Embrace Life’s Favourites #WithAmex” Avurudu campaign to offer its valued Cardmembers the opportunity to indulge in some of the most sought-after dining and holiday experiences across Sri Lanka this Avurudu season.

Whether it be a relaxed family brunch or a more formal night time outing, Nations Trust Bank American Express has ensured to tick all the boxes for their Cardmembers. With the dining benefits offered, you can travel through a multi-cuisine culinary journey with your friends and family; offers include 20% savings on the Sunday Brunch at Courtyard by Marriott – Colombo, 20% savings at Noodles, Cinnamon Grand, 10% savings at Kobe, Boardwalk and Bavarian Garden at the Waters Edge Hotel, 10% savings at Blue Lotus, Galadari from Tuesday to Sunday, 20% savings on the dinner buffet at Hilton Colombo Residencies and up to 15% savings at Chambers, Park Street Mews.

For family and friends who are planning a much-needed getaway during this Avurudu season, cardmembers can enjoy up to 45% savings at a range of Aitken Spence Hotels, including Heritance Ahungalla for a seaside escape, Heritance Kandalama to be one with the wild and Earl’s Regency to wind down amidst the lush green gardens. Celebrate and blossom this Avurudu with Aitken Spence Hotels. These offers are valid for bookings made from 1st April to 1st May, for stays between 2nd April and 8th May. Cardmembers can also enjoy up to 20% savings at a range of Oak Ray Hotels as well as a quick Colombo escape with staycation deals at Fairway Colombo and The Ocean Colombo.

Speaking on these offers, Niluka Gunatilake, Head of Cards, Nations Trust Bank, said, “We understand that Avurudu is a time when families and friends come together to celebrate and create memories. With our dining and hotel offers, we aim to provide our Cardmembers with the opportunity to savour their favourite dining experiences and explore the beauty of Sri Lanka, whether it be the beach, the wild or the hills. We invite all our Cardmembers to make the most of these exclusive offers and embrace life’s favourites with Nations Trust Bank American Express this Avurudu season.”

Offers from Nations Trust Bank American Express partner merchants will run until the 30th of April 2023. For the full list of partner offers, Cardmembers are encouraged to visit americanexpress.lk so that they will be able to Embrace Life’s Favourites with Nations Trust Bank American Express, this Avurudu season.

Nations Trust Bank PLC serves a diverse range of customers across Consumer, Commercial and Corporate segments through an island wide network of 96 branches. The bank is focused on digital empowerment through cutting-edge digital banking technologies, and pioneered FriMi, Sri Lanka’s leading digital banking experience. Nations Trust Bank PLC is an issuer and sole acquirer of American Express Cards in Sri Lanka with market leadership in the premium segments.
